input.sentences: [male] was not excited about thee protest ...
however | he joined in when the parade started .
his sister | whom is older | was ready to let her feelings be known ...
but | [male] just wanted to play until the end..

output.sentences: The young male wore a hat with a star and ribbons and an expression that said, "respect me."
The parade started outside and he soon joined in.
His sister was just as ready to share her feelings in the parade, holding up her colorful, pastel sign.
Their little brother ran along playing with his kite.
There was time for a short speech at the end of the protest and everyone listened closely.
